title: About MartyX Industries
lead: We engineer 3D‑printed RC platforms and parts that are easy to build, maintain, and upgrade. Designed, tested, and refined so you can spend more time driving and less time troubleshooting.

highlights.title: What to expect
highlights.rc_ready: RC‑ready designs with standard hardware fitment
highlights.modular: Modular parts for quick repairs and upgrades
highlights.documentation: Clear build docs, BOMs, and slicer presets
